title: WhatsAppâ€™s new voice messaging features will soon roll out to everyone
content:
WhatsApp added the ability to send voice notes all the way back in 2013. Since its introduction, the feature hasn’t seen any major changes in terms of design or functionality. But that’s finally changing as the instant messaging app has announced some new enhancements for voice notes. In a blog post on Wednesday, WhatsApp announced

The post WhatsApp’s new voice messaging features will soon roll out to everyone appeared first on xda-developers.
description: WhatsApp has announced six new features to improve the voice messaging experience. Read on to know more.
